parameters.query:
SELECT id, ibge_code, name 
FROM territories 
WHERE type = 'municipio' 
ORDER BY name

parameters.query:
-- Inserir ou atualizar valor do indicador
-- ATUALIZADO: usa territory_id em vez de municipality_id
INSERT INTO indicator_values (
  indicator_id,
  territory_id,
  year,
  value,
  aggregation_method,
  is_aggregated,
  data_quality,
  notes
)
SELECT 
  id.id,
  $2::uuid,
  $3::integer,
  $4::decimal,
  $5::text,
  $6::boolean,
  $7::varchar,
  $8::text
FROM indicator_definitions id
WHERE id.code = $1
ON CONFLICT (indicator_id, territory_id, year, month) 
DO UPDATE SET 
  value = EXCLUDED.value,
  aggregation_method = EXCLUDED.aggregation_method,
  is_aggregated = EXCLUDED.is_aggregated,
  data_quality = EXCLUDED.data_quality,
  notes = EXCLUDED.notes,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, indicator_id, year, value;

nodes.name: Upsert Indicator Value
nodes.notes:
Insere ou atualiza valor na tabela indicator_values
ATUALIZADO: usa territory_id e novos campos (aggregation_method, is_aggregated)
Upsert: evita duplicatas

nodes.name: Prepare Dictionary Update
nodes.notes:
Agrupa registros inseridos por indicador
Prepara atualizaÃ§Ã£o do dictionary

parameters.query:
-- Atualizar dictionary com data da Ãºltima coleta
UPDATE indicator_dictionary
SET 
  last_ref_date = make_date($2::integer, 12, 31),
  last_update_date = NOW()
WHERE code = $1
RETURNING code, last_ref_date, last_update_date;

nodes.name: Update Dictionary
nodes.notes: Atualiza last_ref_date e last_update_date no dictionary

nodes.name: Consolidate Summary
nodes.notes:
Consolida resultados finais
Gera resumo da coleta
